item.description:
Let's Ski Stowe January 25-27

SOLD OUT WE ARE 30 PEOPLE WITHIN A GROUP OF 300. TALK ABOUT FUN!

WE HAVE A FEW ROOMS LEFT SO MOVE FAST!!!!!

$235.00 per person--Double Occupancy

$220.00 per person--Triple Occupancy

$385.00 ---------------Single Room ( 1 person)

Weekend Includes:

2 nights lodging

2 Lift Tickets

2 Full Breakfasts

PLEASE SIGN UP ON THE BOSTON SKI MEET UP

http://www.meetup.com/Bostonskimeetup/events/87262712/

Après Ski Party on Saturday afternoon at the Mountaineer

 

RSVP Does NOT guarantee you a room! Paying does.

I will email folks more info when you rsvp.

Please contact me with any questions.

 

This is NOT a 21+ trip. All ages are welcome. There are a few family rooms available. First come first serve.
item.how_to_find_us: Meet and Great 8:00pm Game Room Downstairs
